description.brazilian: Você se despediu de Saira como um cavalheiro
description.english: You said your farewells to Saira
description.french: Tu lui as dit au revoir comme un gentleman.
description.german: Du hast dich von Saira verabschiedet.
description.italian: Hai detto addio a Saira
description.russian: Ты попрощался с Сайрой как настоящий джентльмен
description.schinese: 你像绅士般向赛拉道别
description.spanish: Te despediste de Saira como un caballero

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela durante as noites em que assistiram filmes
description.english: You started your relationship during the movie nights
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle pendant les soirées où vous regardiez des films.
description.german: Ihr habt eure Beziehung während der Filmabende begonnen.
description.italian: Avete iniziato la vostra relazione durante le serate dei film
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней во время вечеров, когда вы смотрели фильмы
description.schinese: 你们在看电影的夜晚开始了恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella durante las noches en las que visteis películas

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela no chuveiro.
description.english: You started your relationship in the shower
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle sous la douche.
description.german: Ihr habt eure Beziehung unter der Dusche begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione sotto la doccia
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней в душе
description.schinese: 你们在淋浴时开始了恋情。
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella en la ducha.

description.brazilian: Você retomou o relacionamento com sua ex na primeira oportunidade, no café.
description.english: You returned with your ex at the first chance
description.french: Tu as repris ta relation avec ton ex dès que l'occasion s'est présentée, au café.
description.german: Du bist bei der ersten Gelegenheit zu deinem Ex zurückgekehrt.
description.italian: Sei tornato con la tua ex alla prima occasione
description.russian: Ты возобновил отношения со своей бывшей при первой же возможности, в кафе
description.schinese: 你抓住咖啡馆里的机会，立刻和前任重修旧好
description.spanish: Reanudaste la relación con tu ex a la primera oportunidad, en el café
description.turkish: İlk fırsatta eski sevgilinle geri döndün

description.brazilian: Você confrontou Jack no café quando descobriu que ele a estava traindo.
description.english: You confronted Jack when you discovered he was a cheater
description.french: Tu t'es disputé avec Jack au café quand tu as découvert qu'il la trompait.
description.german: Du hast Jack zur Rede gestellt, als du herausgefunden hast, dass er ein Betrüger ist.
description.italian: Hai affrontato Jack quando hai scoperto che era un traditore.
description.russian: Ты столкнулся с Джеком в кафе, когда обнаружил, что он ей изменяет
description.schinese: 当你发现杰克在欺骗她时，你在咖啡馆与他正面交锋
description.spanish: Te enfrentaste a Jack en el café cuando descubriste que la estaba engañando
description.turkish: Jack'in aldatıcı olduğunu öğrendiğinde onunla yüzleştin

description.brazilian: Você não confrontou Jack, mas admitiu que pediu a Jamaal para procurar provas de sua traição
description.english: You didn't confront Jack, but you admitted to asking Jamaal to send the pictures
description.french: Tu n'as pas affronté Jack, mais tu as admis avoir demandé à Jamaal de chercher des preuves de sa tromperie.
description.german: Du hast Jack nicht konfrontiert, aber du hast zugegeben, dass du Jamaal gebeten hast, Beweise für seinen Betrug zu suchen.
description.italian: Non hai affrontato Jack, ma hai ammesso di aver chiesto a Jamaal di inviare le foto.
description.russian: Вы не вступили в конфликт с Джеком, но признались, что попросили Джамала найти доказательства его измены
description.schinese: 你没有与杰克对质，但承认曾要求贾马尔寻找他出轨的证据
description.spanish: No te enfrentaste a Jack, pero admitiste que le pediste a Jamaal que buscara pruebas de su engaño
description.turkish: Jack'le yüzleşmedin ama Jamaal'dan fotoğrafları göndermesini istediğini itiraf ettin.

description.brazilian: Você aceitou ensinar as duas garotas a beijar na primeira oportunidade
description.english: You agreed to teach the two girls how to kiss in joint lessons at the first chance
description.french: Tu as accepté d'apprendre à embrasser les deux filles dès que l'occasion s'est présentée.
description.german: Du hast zugestimmt, den beiden Mädchen bei der ersten Gelegenheit das Küssen beizubringen.
description.italian: Hai accettato di insegnare alle due ragazze come baciare durante le lezioni congiunte alla prima occasione.
description.russian: Ты согласился научить обеих девушек целоваться при первой же возможности
description.schinese: 你抓住机会教两个女孩接吻技巧
description.spanish: Aceptaste enseñar a besar a las dos chicas a la primera oportunidad
description.turkish: İlk fırsatta iki kıza ortak derslerde öpüşmeyi öğretmeyi kabul ettin

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela depois de ir ao cabeleireiro
description.english: You started your relationship at the café
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle après être allé chez le coiffeur.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung mit ihr begonnen, nachdem du beim Friseur warst.
description.italian: La vostra relazione è iniziata in un caffè
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней после посещения парикмахерской
description.schinese: 在理发店之后，你与她开始了恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella después de ir a la peluquería

displayName.brazilian: Não é um amor de filme
displayName.french: Ce n'est pas un film d'amour
displayName.spanish: No es un amor de película

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela no quinto dia, no café
description.english: You started your relationship on the fifth day
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle le cinquième jour, au café.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung mit ihr am fünften Tag begonnen, im Café.
description.italian: La vostra relazione è iniziata il quinto giorno
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней на пятый день, в кафе
description.schinese: 第五天，在咖啡馆里，你与她开始了恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella el quinto día, en el café

description.brazilian: Você a espiou no provador
description.english: You peeped on her in the fitting room
description.french: Tu l'as espionnée dans la cabine d'essayage
description.german: Ich habe dich in der Umkleidekabine beobachtet.
description.italian: L'hai spiata nel camerino
description.russian: Ты подглядывал за ней в примерочной
description.schinese: 你在试衣间偷窥了她
description.spanish: La espiaste en el probador

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela no lago
description.english: You started your relationship with her at the lake
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle au lac.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung mit ihr am See begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione con lei al lago
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней на озере
description.schinese: 在湖边与她开始了恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella en el lago

displayName.brazilian: Um bebê com seu primeiro amor
displayName.french: Un bébé avec ton premier amour
displayName.german: Ein Baby mit deiner ersten Liebe
displayName.italian: Un bambino con il tuo primo amore
displayName.spanish: Un bebé con tu primer amor

description.brazilian: Você terá um filho com ela
description.english: You will have a child with your High School girlfriend after reconnecting with her
description.french: Tu auras un enfant avec elle.
description.german: Du wirst ein Kind mit ihr haben.
description.italian: Avrai un figlio con la tua ragazza del liceo dopo esserti rimesso con lei.
description.russian: У тебя будет ребенок от нее
description.schinese: 将与她共同育有子女
description.spanish: Tendrás un hijo con ella
description.turkish: Lise kız arkadaşınla yeniden bağlantı kurduktan sonra onunla bir çocuk sahibi olacaksın

description.brazilian: Você confessou que se sentia atraído por ela na primeira oportunidade
description.english: You confessed to your best friend's mother
description.french: Tu lui as avoué que tu étais attiré par elle dès que tu en as eu l'occasion.
description.german: Du hast ihr bei der ersten Gelegenheit gestanden, dass du dich zu ihr hingezogen fühlst.
description.italian: Hai confessato alla madre del tuo migliore amico
description.russian: Ты признался ей в своих чувствах при первой же возможности
description.schinese: 你抓住第一个机会向她表白了心意
description.spanish: Le confesaste que te sentías atraído por ella a la primera oportunidad
description.turkish: En iyi arkadaşının annesine itiraf ettin

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela na primeira oportunidade
description.english: You started your relationship with her at the first chance
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle dès que l'occasion s'est présentée.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung mit ihr bei der ersten Gelegenheit begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione con lei alla prima occasione
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней при первой же возможности
description.schinese: 你抓住第一次机会就和她开始了关系
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella a la primera oportunidad

description.brazilian: Você concordou em dar aulas particulares para ela
description.english: You agreed to teach particular kissing lessons to her
description.french: Tu as accepté de lui donner des cours particuliers.
description.german: Du hast zugestimmt, ihm Privatunterricht zu geben.
description.italian: Hai accettato di darle delle lezioni particolari di bacio.
description.russian: Ты согласился давать ей частные уроки
description.schinese: 你同意给她上私人课程
description.spanish: Accediste a darle lecciones particulares
description.turkish: Ona özel öpücük dersleri vermeyi kabul ettin

displayName.brazilian: Um beijo na banheira de hidromassagem

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela na segunda oportunidade
description.english: You started your relationship with her at the second chance
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle à la deuxième occasion.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung mit ihr bei der zweiten Chance begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione con lei alla seconda occasione
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней при второй возможности
description.schinese: 你第二次机会就和她开始了恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella a la segunda oportunidad

description.brazilian: Você habilitou o conteúdo entre garotas durante o jogo Verdade ou Desafio
description.english: You enabled the girl content during the Truth or Dare game
description.french: Tu as activé le contenu lesbien pendant le jeu Action ou Vérité.
description.german: Du hast den Inhalt zwischen Mädchen während des Spiels Wahrheit oder Pflicht freigegeben.
description.italian: Hai abilitato i contenuti lesbici durante il gioco Obbligo o Verità.
description.russian: Ты активировал контент между девушками во время игры
description.schinese: 你在真心话大冒险游戏中解锁了女生内容
description.spanish: Habilitaste el contenido entre chicas durante el juego de Verdad o Reto
description.turkish: Gerçek mi Cesaret mi oyunu sırasında kız içeriğini etkinleştirdin

description.brazilian: Você a ajudou na primeira vez que ela dormiu no seu quarto
description.english: You helped the girl in her first sleepover
description.french: Tu l'as aidée la première fois qu'elle a dormi dans ta chambre.
description.german: Du hast ihr geholfen, als sie das erste Mal in deinem Zimmer übernachtet hat.
description.italian: Hai aiutato la ragazza nel suo primo pigiama party
description.russian: Ты помог ей, когда она впервые осталась ночевать в твоей комнате
description.schinese: 她第一次在你房间过夜时，你帮助了她
description.spanish: La ayudaste la primera vez que se quedó a dormir en tu habitación
description.turkish: Kızın ilk pijama partisinde yardım ettin

description.brazilian: Você vai ter um filho com ela
description.english: You will have a child the lady next door
description.french: Tu auras un enfant avec elle.
description.german: Du wirst ein Kind mit ihr haben.
description.italian: Avrai un figlio dalla signora della porta accanto
description.russian: У тебя будет ребенок от нее
description.schinese: 你将与她生下一个孩子
description.spanish: Vas a tener un hijo con ella
description.turkish: Bir çocuğun olacak, yan evdeki hanımefendi

description.brazilian: Você concordou em dar aulas particulares para ela
description.english: You agreed to teach particular lessons to her
description.french: Tu as accepté de lui donner des cours particuliers.
description.german: Du hast zugestimmt, ihm Privatunterricht zu geben.
description.italian: Hai accettato di insegnarle alcune lezioni particolari.
description.russian: Ты согласился давать ей частные уроки
description.schinese: 你同意给她补习
description.spanish: Accediste a darle lecciones particulares
description.turkish: Ona özel dersler vermeyi kabul ettin

description.brazilian: Você não se declarou na sua casa, mas na dela
description.english: You started the relationship with her at her home
description.french: Tu ne t'es pas déclaré chez toi, mais chez elle.
description.german: Du hast ihr nicht bei dir zu Hause, sondern bei ihr zu Hause deine Liebe gestanden.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la relazione con lei a casa sua
description.russian: Ты признался ей не у себя дома, а у нее
description.schinese: 你没有在她家表白，而是在她家
description.spanish: No te declaraste en tu casa sino en la suya

description.brazilian: Você disse à enfermeira que gostava de natural
description.english: You told her you liked it natural
description.french: Tu as dit à l'infirmière que tu aimais au naturel
description.german: Du hast der Krankenschwester gesagt, dass du sie natürlich magst.
description.italian: Le hai detto che ti piaceva al naturale.
description.russian: Ты сказал медсестре, что тебе нравится естественный вид
description.schinese: 你告诉护士喜欢自然状态
description.spanish: Le dijiste a la enfermera que te gustaba natural

description.brazilian: Você disse à enfermeira que gostava de suavidade
description.english: You told her you liked it smooth
description.french: Tu as dit à l'infirmière que tu aimais être rasée.
description.german: Du hast der Krankenschwester gesagt, dass du es rasiert magst.
description.italian: Le hai detto che ti piaceva liscio
description.russian: Ты сказал медсестре, что тебе нравится мягкий вид
description.schinese: 你告诉护士你喜欢温柔的
description.spanish: Le dijiste a la enfermera que te gustaba suave

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela na primeira oportunidade, marcando um encontro para treinar
description.english: You started your relationship with her at the first chance
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle dès que tu en as eu l'occasion, en la rencontrant pour t'entraîner.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung zu ihr bei der ersten Gelegenheit begonnen und dich mit ihr zum Training verabredet.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione con lei alla prima occasione
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней при первой же возможности, встречаясь с ней для тренировок
description.schinese: 你抓住第一个机会就和她开始了关系，约她一起训练
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella a la primera oportunidad, quedando con ella para entrenar

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela na primeira oportunidade
description.english: You started your relationship with her on the first chance
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle dès que l'occasion s'est présentée.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung mit ihr bei der ersten Gelegenheit begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione con lei alla prima occasione
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней при первой же возможности
description.schinese: 你抓住第一个机会就和她开始了关系
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella a la primera oportunidad

description.brazilian: Você começou um relacionamento romântico com ela
description.english: You started the relationship with her in a romantic way
description.french: Tu as commencé une relation amoureuse avec elle.
description.german: Du hast eine romantische Beziehung mit ihr begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la relazione con lei in modo romantico
description.russian: Ты начал с ней романтические отношения
description.schinese: 你与她展开了浪漫关系
description.spanish: Empezaste una relación romántica con ella

description.brazilian: O relacionamento começou com ela tentando corromper você. Pobre garota inocente!
description.english: She tried to corrupt you. Poor naive girl!
description.french: La relation a commencé quand elle a essayé de te corrompre. Pauvre petite innocente !
description.german: Die Beziehung begann damit, dass sie versuchte, dich zu korrumpieren. Armes unschuldiges Mädchen!
description.italian: Ha cercato di corromperti. Povera ragazza ingenua!
description.russian: Отношения начались с того, что она попыталась тебя подкупить. Бедная невинная девочка!
description.schinese: 这段关系始于她试图腐蚀你。可怜的无辜女孩！
description.spanish: La relación empezó con ella intentando corromperte. ¡Pobre chica inocente!
description.turkish: Seni yozlaştırmaya çalıştı. Zavallı saf kız!

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela na segunda chance, quando a encontrou enquanto corria
description.english: You started your relationship with her on the second chance
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle à la deuxième occasion, quand tu l'as rencontrée pendant que tu courais.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung zu ihr bei der zweiten Gelegenheit begonnen, als du sie beim Laufen getroffen hast.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la tua relazione con lei grazie a una seconda possibilità.
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней со второго раза, когда встретил ее во время бега
description.schinese: 第二次机会时，你在跑步途中遇见她，由此开启了你们的恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella a la segunda oportunidad, cuando te la encontraste mientras corrías

description.english: You rejected her
description.french: Tu l'as rejetée à chaque fois.
description.german: Du hast sie jedes Mal abgelehnt.
description.italian: L'hai respinta
description.russian: Ты отвергал ее каждый раз
description.schinese: 你每次都拒绝了她
description.spanish: La rechazaste todas las veces

description.russian: Ты отверг ее

description.spanish: La rechazaste

displayName.french: Il n'y a pas d'amour déguisé
displayName.italian: Non c'è amore per i costumi

description.brazilian: Você a rejeitou

description.brazilian: Você vai ter um filho com ela
description.english: You will have a child with her
description.french: Tu auras un enfant avec elle.
description.german: Du wirst ein Kind mit ihr haben.
description.italian: Avrai un figlio con lei
description.russian: У тебя будет ребенок от нее
description.schinese: 你会和她生个孩子
description.spanish: Vas a tener un hijo con ella

description.brazilian: Você começou seu relacionamento com ela na sauna
description.english: You started the relationship with her in the sauna
description.french: Tu as commencé ta relation avec elle dans le sauna.
description.german: Du hast deine Beziehung zu ihr in der Sauna begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato la relazione con lei nella sauna
description.russian: Ты начал отношения с ней в сауне
description.schinese: 你在桑拿房里和她开始了恋情
description.spanish: Empezaste tu relación con ella en la sauna

displayName.brazilian: Tudo o que você precisa é amor
displayName.french: Tout ce dont tu as besoin c'est d'amour
displayName.german: Alles was du brauchst ist Liebe
displayName.italian: Tutto ciò di cui hai bisogno è l'amore
displayName.russian: Все, что тебе нужно, это любовь
displayName.schinese: 爱就是你所需要的一切
displayName.spanish: Todo lo que necesitas es amor

description.brazilian: Você começou um relacionamento romântico com ela
description.english: You started a romantic relationship with her
description.french: Tu as commencé une relation amoureuse avec elle.
description.german: Du hast eine romantische Beziehung mit ihr begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato una relazione romantica con lei
description.russian: Ты начал романтические отношения с ней
description.schinese: 你与她开始了浪漫关系
description.spanish: Empezaste una relación romántica con ella

description.brazilian: Você aceitou a chantagem dela
description.english: You accepted her blackmail
description.french: Tu as accepté son chantage.
description.german: Du hast dich erpressen lassen.
description.italian: Hai accettato il suo ricatto
description.russian: Ты согласился на ее шантаж
description.schinese: 你接受了她的勒索
description.spanish: Aceptaste su chantaje

description.brazilian: Você deu a volta por cima na chantagem dela
description.english: You counter-blackmailed her
description.french: Renverser la situation
description.german: Du hast ihre Erpressung zunichte gemacht.
description.italian: L'hai ricattata a tua volta
description.russian: Ты перевернул ее шантаж
description.schinese: 你扭转了她的勒索局面
description.spanish: Le diste la vuelta a su chantaje

description.brazilian: Você aceitou dar aulas conjuntas na segunda chance
description.english: You agreed to teach them how to kiss at the second chance
description.french: Tu as accepté de leur donner les cours communs à la deuxième occasion.
description.german: Du hast zugestimmt, den beiden Mädchen bei der zweiten Gelegenheit gemeinsamen Unterricht zu geben.
description.italian: Hai accettato di insegnare alle due ragazze come baciare alla seconda occasione
description.russian: Ты согласился дать им совместные уроки во второй раз
description.schinese: 你同意在第二次机会中共同授课
description.spanish: Aceptaste darles las lecciones conjuntas a la segunda oportunidad
description.turkish: İkinci şansta onlara öpüşmeyi öğretmeyi kabul ettin

description.brazilian: Você iniciou um relacionamento com todas as garotas possíveis na Temporada 1
description.english: You started every possible relationship in Season 1
description.french: Tu as commencé une relation avec toutes les filles possibles dans la saison 1.
description.german: Du hast in Staffel 1 eine Beziehung mit allen möglichen Mädchen begonnen.
description.italian: Hai iniziato ogni possibile relazione nella stagione 1
description.russian: Ты завязал отношения со всеми девушками в Сезоне 1
description.schinese: 你在第一季与所有可能的女孩建立了关系
description.spanish: Empezaste una relación con todas las chicas posibles en la Temporada 1

description.brazilian: Você não iniciou nenhum relacionamento na Temporada 1
description.english: You didn't start any relationship in Season 1
description.french: Tu n'as commencé aucune relation avec aucune fille dans la saison 1.
description.german: Du hast in Staffel 1 keine Beziehung begonnen.
description.italian: Non hai iniziato nessuna relazione nella stagione 1
description.russian: Ты не завязал ни одного романа в Сезоне 1
description.schinese: 你在第一季未与任何人建立关系
description.spanish: No empezaste ninguna relación en la Temporada 1

description.brazilian: Você vai ter um filho com todas as garotas possíveis na Temporada 1, no mínimo 10
description.english: You will have a child with everyone available in Season 1. At least 10
description.french: Tu vas avoir un enfant avec toutes les filles possibles dans la saison 1, au moins 10.
description.german: Du wirst in Staffel 1 mit allen möglichen Mädchen ein Kind zeugen, mindestens 10.
description.italian: Avrai un figlio con ogni ragazza disponibile nella stagione 1. Almeno 10.
description.russian: У тебя будет ребенок от всех девушек, с которыми ты мог завести отношения в сезоне 1, минимум 10
description.schinese: 你将在第一季与所有可能的女孩生下孩子，至少10个
description.spanish: Vas a tener un hijo con todas las chicas posibles en la Temporada 1, como mínimo 10
description.turkish: 1. Sezonda herkes müsait olduğu bir çocuğun olacak. En az 10

description.brazilian: Você a convenceu a praticar mais esportes e a se alimentar de forma mais saudável
description.english: You convinced her to eat healthier and do more sport
description.french: Tu l'as convaincue de faire plus de sport et de manger plus sainement.
description.german: Du hast sie überzeugt, mehr Sport zu treiben und sich gesünder zu ernähren.
description.italian: L'hai convinta a mangiare più sano e a fare più sport.
description.russian: Ты убедил ее больше заниматься спортом и питаться более здоровой пищей
description.schinese: 说服她多运动并改善饮食
description.spanish: La convenciste para que hiciera más deporte y para que comiera más sano
description.turkish: Onu daha sağlıklı beslenmeye ve daha fazla spor yapmaya ikna ettin

description.brazilian: Você a convenceu a praticar mais esportes, mas não a comer de forma mais saudável
description.english: You convinced her to do more sport, but not to eat healthier
description.french: Tu l'as convaincue de faire plus de sport, mais pas de manger plus sainement.
description.german: Du hast sie überzeugt, mehr Sport zu treiben, aber nicht, sich gesünder zu ernähren.
description.italian: L'hai convinta a fare più sport, ma non a mangiare più sano.
description.russian: Ты убедил ее больше заниматься спортом, но не убедил ее питаться более здоровой пищей
description.schinese: 你成功说服她增加运动量，但未能让她养成更健康的饮食习惯
description.spanish: La convenciste para que hiciera más deporte, pero no para que comiera más sano
description.turkish: Onu daha fazla spor yapmaya ikna ettin ama daha sağlıklı beslenmeye değil
